pgTitle: List of Philippine–American War Medal of Honor recipients

rows.text: Error: 1899 May 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Company B, 1st North Dakota Volunteer Infantry
With 11 other scouts, completely routed about 300 of the enemy
Error: 1899 July 26 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Swam the San Juan River in the face of the enemy's fire and [forced them to retreat]”
Error: 1901 November 17 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Subsequently awarded the Distinguished Service Cross for actions in World War I
Error: 1899 October 17 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Led a successful charge against a superior force, capturing and dispersing the enemy and relieving other members of his regiment from a perilous position”
Error: 1899 September 9 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Chief of Staff of the United States Army
Error: 1902 May 2 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Crossed a fire-swept field, in close range of the enemy, and brought a wounded soldier to a place of shelter”
Error: 1900 October 21 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”With but 19 men resisted and at close quarters defeated 300 of the enemy”
Error: 1899 May 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”With 12 men charged and routed 300 of the enemy”
Error: 1899 May 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Company I, 1st North Dakota Volunteer Infantry
”With 21 other scouts completely routed 600 of the enemy”

Error: 1899 March 25 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. Error: 1899 March 27 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. Error: 1899 March 29 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. Error: 1899 April 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”For distinguished conduct in the presence of the enemy in battle”
Error: 1899 July 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Rallied his men on the bridge after the line had been broken and pushed back

Error: 1900 April 15 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. – Error: 1900 April 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Assumed command of a detachment and withstood the attacks of a large enemy force for 2 days, saving the lives of the survivors and protecting the wounded until relief came”
Error: 1911 September 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1900 August 23 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Single-handed, he defended a disabled comrade against a greatly superior force of the enemy”
Error: 1906 March 7 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life to carry a wounded man and the body of one who was killed beside him
Error: 1899 November 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”While in command of a detachment of 4 men, charged and routed 40 entrenched insurgents, inflicting on them heavy loss.
Error: 1899 May 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Company G, 1st North Dakota Volunteer Infantry
”With 21 other scouts completely routed 600 of the enemy”
Error: 1899 May 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Company H, 1st North Dakota Volunteer Infantry
With 11 other scouts, completely routed about 300 of the enemy
Error: 1899 December 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Discovered a party of insurgents inside a wall, climbed to the top of the wall, covered them with his gun, and forced them to stack arms and surrender.”
Error: 1899 September 28 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Charged alone a body of the enemy and captured a captain”
Error: 1906 March 8 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For displaying bravery and extraordinary heroism in the presence of the enemy
Error: 1900 July 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”For distinguished conduct in the presence of the enemy during battle”
Error: 1899 April 27 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

Error: 1899 September 12 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. – Error: 1899 September 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For extraordinary heroism and gallantry while under fire of the enemy
Error: 1899 November 9 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Distinguished bravery and conspicuous gallantry in action against insurgents”
Error: 1899 December 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1900 February 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
“Singlehanded, defended his mortally wounded captain from an overwhelming force of the enemy”
Error: 1899 December 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Attempted under a heavy fire of the enemy to swim a river for the purpose of obtaining and returning with a canoe”
Error: 1899 September 3 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”While on a scout drove off a superior force of insurgents and with the assistance of 1 comrade brought from the field of action the bodies of 2 comrades, 1 killed and the other severely wounded.”
Error: 1901 July 2 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Charged alone an insurgent outpost with his pistol, killing 1, wounding 2, and capturing 3 insurgents with their rifles and equipment.”
Error: 1899 September 9 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”In advance of his regiment, rushed to the assistance of his colonel, charging, pistol in hand, 7 insurgents, and compelling surrender of all not killed or wounded.”
Error: 1911 September 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1900 February 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Distinguished himself by meritorious conduct in the presence of the enemy
Error: 1899 December 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1909 July 2 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For bravery in action during the Moro Uprising
Error: 1911 September 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1899 May 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”With 21 other scouts charged across a burning bridge, under heavy fire, and completely routed 600 of the enemy who were entrenched in a strongly fortified position.”
Error: 1899 November 9 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”For distinguished bravery and conspicuous gallantry in action against insurgents”
Error: 1899 May 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Company D, 1st North Dakota Volunteer Infantry

”With 11 other scouts, without waiting for the supporting battalion to aid them or to get into a position to do so, charged over a distance of about yards (m) and completely routed about 300 of the enemy, who were in line and in a position that could only be carried by a frontal attack”
Error: 1906 March 7 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Voluntarily took part in and was dangerously wounded during an assault on the enemy's works.”
Error: 1909 July 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”While in action against hostile Moros, he entered with a few enlisted men the mouth of a cave occupied by a desperate enemy, this act having been ordered after he had volunteered several times. In this action 2d Lt. Kennedy was severely wounded.”
Error: 1899 February 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”Within a range of yards (m) of the enemy and in the face of a rapid fire climbed a telegraph pole at the east end of the bridge and in full view of the enemy coolly and carefully repaired a broken telegraph wire, thereby reestablishing telegraphic communication to the front.”
Error: 1899 May 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”With 21 other scouts charged across a burning bridge, under heavy fire, and completely routed 600 of the enemy who were entrenched in a strongly fortified position.”
Error: 1899 September 3 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”Distinguished gallantry in action in driving off a superior force and with the assistance of 1 comrade brought from the field of action the bodies of 2 comrades, 1 killed and the other severely wounded, this while on a scout.”

Error: 1899 March 25 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. Error: 1899 March 27 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. Error: 1899 March 29 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. Error: 1899 April 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1899 November 11 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”For most distinguished gallantry in leading his battalion upon the entrenchments of the enemy, on which occasion he fell mortally wounded”
Error: 1899 May 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Company A, 1st North Dakota Volunteer Infantry
”With 21 other scouts charged across a burning bridge, under heavy fire, and completely routed 600 of the enemy who were entrenched in a strongly fortified position.”
Error: 1899 May 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”With 11 other scouts, without waiting for the supporting battalion to aid them or to get into position to do so, charged over a distance of about yards (m) and completely routed about 300 of the enemy, who were in line and in a position that could only be carried by a frontal attack.”
Error: 1900 May 6 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Charged an occupied bastion, saving the life of an officer in a hand-to-hand combat and destroying the enemy”
Error: 1899 October 29 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”While in attendance upon the wounded and under a severe fire from the enemy, seized a carbine and beat off an attack upon wounded officers and men under his charge.”
Error: 1899 December 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Fought for hours lying between 2 dead comrades, notwithstanding his hat was pierced, his clothing plowed through by bullets, and his face cut and bruised by flying gravel.”
Error: 1899 July 26 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Swam the San Juan River in the face of the enemy's fire and drove him from his entrenchments”
Error: 1911 September 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1909 July 2 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Defended a machine gun from capture by the enemy along with Sergeant Joseph Henderson
Error: 1900 September 17 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”After the attacking party had become demoralized, fearlessly led a small body of troops under a severe fire and through water waist deep in the attack against the enemy.”
Error: 1913 June 11 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Voluntarily entered a cleared space within about yards (m) of the Moro trenches under a furious fire from them and carried a wounded soldier of his company to safety at the risk of his own life.”
Error: 1911 September 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”Having been badly wounded continued to fire his rifle with one hand until the enemy was repulsed, thereby aiding materially in preventing the annihilation of his party and the mutilation of their bodies”
Error: 1900 May 29 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Voluntarily left shelter and at great personal risk passed the enemy's lines and brought relief to besieged comrades”
Error: 1899 December 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”While in command of a small garrison repulsed a savage night attack by overwhelming numbers of the enemy, fighting at close quarters in the dark for several hours.”
Error: 1899 October 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Held a bridge against a superior force of the enemy and fought, though severely wounded, until the main body came up to cross.”
Error: 1901 November 17 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

Error: 1899 March 25 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. Error: 1899 March 27 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. Error: 1899 March 29 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. Error: 1899 April 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”For distinguished conduct in the presence of the enemy in battle”
Error: 1899 May 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”With 11 other scouts without waiting for the supporting battalion to aid them or to get into a position to do so, charged over a distance of about yards (m) and completely routed about 300 of the enemy who were in line and in a position that could only be carried by a frontal attack.”
Error: 1899 October 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Captured a bridge with the detachment he commanded and held it against a superior force of the enemy, thereby enabling an army to come up and cross.”
Error: 1899 May 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”With 21 other scouts charged across a burning bridge, under heavy fire, and completely routed 600 of the enemy who were entrenched in a strongly fortified position.”
Error: 1899 May 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Company H, 1st North Dakota Volunteer Infantry
”With 21 other scouts charged across a burning bridge, under heavy fire, and completely routed 600 of the enemy who were entrenched in a strongly fortified position.”
Error: 1899 June 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”With 9 men volunteered to hold an advanced position and held it against a terrific fire of the enemy estimated at 1,000 strong. Taking a rifle from a wounded man, and cartridges from the belts of others, Capt. Sage himself killed 5 of the enemy.”
Error: 1900 September 14 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”With 22 men defeated 400 insurgents, killing 36 and wounding 90”
Error: 1903 May 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”For distinguished gallantry in leading the assault and, under a heavy fire from the enemy, maintaining alone his position on the parapet after the first 3 men who followed him there had been killed or wounded, until a foothold was gained by others and the capture of the place assured.”
Error: 1900 April 26 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Advanced alone under heavy fire of the enemy and rescued a wounded comrade”
Error: 1899 March 25 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”Voluntarily exposed himself to the fire of the enemy and went with 4 men to the relief of 2 native Filipinos Iying wounded about yards (m) in front of the lines and personally carried one of them to a place of safety.”
Error: 1899 April 12 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Single-handed and alone defended his dead and wounded comrades against a greatly superior force of the enemy”
Error: 1899 November 26 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”While crossing a river in face of the enemy, this officer plunged in and at the imminent risk of his own life saved from drowning an enlisted man of his regiment.”
Error: 1900 July 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”For distinguished conduct in the presence of the enemy in battle”
Error: 1899 December 21 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”Voluntarily exposed himself to a hot fire from the enemy in repelling with pistol fire an insurgent attack and at great risk of his own life went under fire to the rescue of a wounded officer and carried him to a place of safety.”
Error: 1900 May 6 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”For heroism and gallantry under fire of the enemy”
Error: 1899 April 27 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”Swam the Rio Grande de Pampanga in face of the enemy's fire and fastened a rope to the occupied trenches, thereby enabling the crossing of the river and the driving of the enemy from his fortified position.”
Error: 1901 November 23 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”While in pursuit of a band of insurgents was the first of his detachment to emerge from a canyon, and seeing a column of insurgents and fearing they might turn and dispatch his men as they emerged one by one from the canyon, galloped forward and closed with the insurgents, thereby throwing them into confusion until the arrival of others of the detachment.”
Error: 1911 September 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1900 January 18 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Under heavy fire of the enemy he rescued a dying comrade who was sinking beneath the water”
Error: 1900 March 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”With another officer and a native Filipino, was shot at from an ambush, the other officer falling severely wounded. 2d Lt. Wallace fired in the direction of the enemy, put them to rout, removed the wounded officer from the path, returned to the town, a mile distant, and summoned assistance from his command.”
Error: 1899 November 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”Alone and unaided, charged a body of 15 insurgents, dislodging them, killing 4 and wounding several.”
Error: 1906 December 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”With his right arm cut open with a bolo, went to the assistance of a wounded constabulary officer and a fellow soldier who were surrounded by about 40 Pulajanes, and, using his disabled rifle as a club, beat back the assailants and rescued his party.”
Error: 1899 November 20 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
”While carrying important orders on the battlefield, was desperately wounded and, being unable to walk, crawled far enough to deliver his orders.”
Error: 1899 April 27 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”Swam the Rio Grande de Pampanga in face of the enemy's fire and fastened a rope to occupied trenches, thereby enabling the crossing of the river and the driving of the enemy from his fortified position.”
Error: 1909 July 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

”While in action against hostile Moros, when, it being necessary to secure a mountain gun in position by rope and tackle, voluntarily with the assistance of an enlisted man, carried the rope forward and fastened it, being all the time under heavy fire of the enemy at short range.”
